Anxiety.description: A mental health condition characterized by persistent feelings of worry and fear that interfere with daily activities.

videos.title: Understanding Anxiety: Causes and Symptoms
videos.description: Learn about what anxiety is, its common causes, and how to recognize its symptoms.

videos.title: Coping Strategies for Anxiety
videos.description: Practical techniques and strategies to manage anxiety in daily life.

videos.title: Anxiety Treatment Options
videos.description: Overview of different treatment approaches for anxiety disorders.

Depression.description: A mood disorder causing persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest that affects how you feel, think and behave.

videos.title: What is Depression?
videos.description: Understanding depression, its symptoms, and impact on daily life.

videos.title: Managing Depression
videos.description: Effective strategies for managing depression symptoms.

videos.title: Depression Treatment Options
videos.description: Overview of available treatments for depression.

Bipolar.description: A mental health condition that causes extreme mood swings including emotional highs (mania) and lows (depression).

videos.title: Understanding Bipolar Disorder
videos.description: Learn about the basics of bipolar disorder and its types.

videos.title: Bipolar Treatment Approaches
videos.description: Different treatment options for managing bipolar disorder.

Schizophrenia.description: A serious mental disorder in which people interpret reality abnormally, affecting thinking, behavior and emotions.

videos.title: Understanding Schizophrenia
videos.description: Learn about the symptoms and causes of schizophrenia.

videos.title: Living with Schizophrenia
videos.description: Personal experiences and daily management strategies.
